sentence.Network_en: The brothers usually roll into their studio around midday.
sentence.Network_cn: 兄弟几个总是要到正午前后才姗姗来到工作室。

sentence.Network_en: Isn't it about time that you pulled your finger out?
sentence.Network_cn: 现在到了你该赶紧动起来的时候了吧？

sentence.Network_en: Rock'n'roll has become so commercialised and safe since punk.
sentence.Network_cn: 摇滚乐自从朋克乐以后就已经过于商业化而缺乏新意了。
